page.title: 11 Northdown Road Shops
page.content: Northdown Road shopping centre is fairly large and is in the Cliftonville area of Margate.There are 172 shops on either side of the one straight street which runs roughly parallel to and about \km from the sea cliffs.The shops are fairly old-some about 75 years old,others started as houses which were converted into shops as were needed,the shop keepers then living above the shops.There are 5 large shops-a supermarket,a furniture store,a garden centre,printer's and Woolworth's.The rest are small shops- 22 selling food and drink,22 clothes and shoes,22 household goods,16 newsagents/stationers,11 garages/ vehicle spare parts,22 pubs,hotels, restaurants, cafes and take-aways and 46 offering specialist services (banks ,building societies, estate agents, hairdressers,solicitors,cleaners,etc.)
